title: 5 Of the Best Handguns for Self Defense
text:

Aaron Spuler is a firearms enthusiast and recreational shooter. Follow more or his work at The Weapon Blog
Quite a number of people use baseball bats for physical protection. A bat is good but having one will not give you peace of mind as compared to having a handgun for self-defense. It is great to arm yourself so that you can protect your family and property in case of a break in. The big question remains, which is the best handgun should you buy for self-defense?
Things to think about when purchasing the best handguns for self-defense
Before we get the best handguns that you need for self-defense, it is important to know some of the most important things that you need to know when purchasing a handgun for self-defense. These factors include the following:
Budget
You need to set a budget and determine how much money you want to spend purchasing the handgun. The good thing is that you can get handguns to suit all budgets. There are also expensive models that cost thousands of dollars. Setting the right budget lies in your hands. I would recommend a quality gun that is reliable and ergonomically designed and comes from a recognized manufacturer. With a budget range from $400-$800, you can get the best handgun for personal protection.
Do you want a new or used handgun?
What are your buying habits? Do you love purchasing new or used products? If you want to save some money, you can consider purchasing a used handgun that comes at a lower price as compared to new.
Comfort
How comfortable do you feel when holding the gun? A gun for personal protection should have controls that are easy to reach. It should fit comfortably into your hands. The gun should also provide you with a natural point when you are shooting.
Size
It is very important to choose the size of the handgun. The best size that you need to get for self-defense is a full-size meaning. It is easy to shoot and provides a larger grip area.
Caliber
If you are a beginner, it is advisable to look for a handgun with 9mm because it is affordable and easy to find. It also has a mid-recoil and high capacity for magazines.
5 Best Handguns for Self Defense
Now that you know some of the most important considerations when picking a handgun, the following are some top 5 best handguns that are suitable for personal protection. On top of that, if you would love to get more details about rifles, shotguns, gun safes, and much more information, you can visit gunsafeable.com .
#1: GLOCK – G17 4.49IN 9MM GAS NITRIDE 17+1RD
If you are a buying a handgun and don’t plan on concealed carrying, the Glock is a perfect product to purchase for protection. This is a handgun that is purposely made for professionals. It is common in law enforcement because of its large magazine capacity that can hold up to 17 rounds. It is also very reliable and lightweight. This handgun is designed with better traction giving you a very comfortable grip. The handgun brags of a safe action trigger system making it safe and easy to use in high-pressure situations.
The only restriction for this handgun is that it requires federal Firearm license . If you do not have the license, it will be difficult to get the gun and they will end up withholding your order. Also, you must be over the age of 18 years to purchase the gun.
#2: Salt Supply Pepper Spray Gun Self Defense Kit
Having the right firearm will help you protect your family in cases of home attacks. If you want an all in one kit, I would recommend this incredible gun from Salt Supply Co. this is a company that prides itself on providing customers with the best firearms and high standard customer service. This kit comes with everything that you for self-defense. It includes 10 pepper spray rounds, 1 pepper spray gun, 10 practice round, lockable case, 1 magazine and a manual that is easy to follow.
This handgun provides you with long distance shooting to protect yourself. It has over 150 feet and 21 shots proven range. This is a gun that is certified for reliability and military strength by the US agencies as well as other agencies. It is also easy to use and doesn’t produce a loud sound when you fire. Loading it is also pretty simple especially in cases of emergencies.
#3: Smith & Wesson .44 Magnum
The Smith is another top-rated handgun for home and self-defense. This is an ideal gun if you are a handgun shooter, love revolvers or if you are a competitive shooter. The gun is designed in a way that it is easy to use hence saving you when you are attacked at night. In just a single shot, this gun can bring down the target down. You can get it in different barrel lengths depending on what suits you best. You also need to get a federal firearm license to purchase the gun and must be over 18 years of age. This gun cannot be shipped outside the US.
#4: Ruger GP100
When you are purchasing a handgun for personal protection, you need to pay attention to the reliability and its stopping power. These are two great qualities that make the Ruger handgun a perfect pick for self-defense. The gun is from a top manufacturer known for accurate, dependable and reliable products. The handgun is designed with a patented transfer-bar that keeps it sure against accidental discharges.
#5: Mossberg 500/590
With the increased home break-ins, it is crucial to have a handgun for personal protection. The Mossberg is a reliable handgun perfect for home defense. It has a unique pump racking sound that scares away intruders. The gun comes at an affordable price and their ammunition are also affordable so you can enjoy shooting without spending too much money. This gun is rugged and has many accessories that help you to customize it. The controls are natural so you will not experience a hard time when using it.
Final words
The number of cases reported for home burglaries increases every year in the United States. According to research carried out there are over 2 million home burglaries reported every year. Over 66 percent of them are home break-ins . This is why you need to arm yourself with the best handgun for home defense so that you can protect your family and property. I believe you can pick any of the five top-rated handguns above for personal protection. These are incredible guns that are easy to use and provide you with reliability and accuracy when you need them. Pick your favorite and you will have a peace of mind.
